short_summary: daily technical support at Canadian Air and Precipitation Monitoring Network
description: Canadian Air and Precipitation Monitoring Network \\u2013 Pinehouse Lake, SK \\n provides daily technical support at the Canadian Air and Precipitation Monitoring Network (CAPMoN) Pinehouse Lake site 12 kilometres west of Pinehouse Lake, Saskatchewan. The Contractor must provide a contract operator to attend to the station to retrieve and process the samples according to the CAPMoN Standard Operating Procedures (SOP's). The samples are then packaged and shipped for analysis to either the CAPMoN National Laboratory located in Toronto, Ontario. The Operator must ensure the required sampling, shipping, and maintenance performed in accordance with the procedure normalisée.
